body_html:
yes, same here, don't think this is a windows specific thing. There are a bunch of references to the CUDNN_STATUS_MAPPING_ERROR mostly hinting at resource problems with large convolutions but without clear root cause. If your model is a large cnn you could try a smaller batch size and see if this makes a difference.
Is there a way that I can run this model myself?
For windows/1.2.1: just ran some tests with a larger cnn on a 1080 and it was happy.

There are a bunch of references to the CUDNN_STATUS_MAPPING_ERROR mostly hinting at resource problems with large convolutions but without clear root cause. If your model is a large cnn you could try a smaller batch size and see if this makes a difference.
